welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Morlaix, a charming town known for its picturesque cobblestone streets and breathtaking views. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Morlaix Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights and private charters.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brest Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
